sentences.en: But we are soon engrossed in his character and problems.
sentences.cn: 然而我们用不了多久就被他的性格和他的问题迷住了.

sentences.en: He did not want to seem important, engrossed in large affairs, when his brother appeared.
sentences.cn: 他不愿在他兄弟出现的时候使自己显得重要, 埋头重大事务之中.

sentences.en: He seemed completely engrossed in his book.
sentences.cn: 他好像完全被他的那本书迷住了.

sentences.en: He was so engrossed in his work that he frequently stayed up until the small hours.
sentences.cn: 他全神贯注地工作,经常工作到下半夜.

sentences.en: He's deeply engrossed in physical research.
sentences.cn: 他醉心于物理学的研究.

sentences.en: No one had ever been quite so engrossed in an evening paper.
sentences.cn: 没人会对一份晚报如此全神贯注.

sentences.en: She was engrossed in her book.
The contact has been engrossed ready for signature.
sentences.cn: 合同已正式写成等待签署.

sentences.en: The student is engrossed in his book.
sentences.cn: 这名学生正在专心致志地看书.

sentences.en: They sat, silently hugging their knees, engrossed in their individual thoughts.
sentences.cn: 他们默默地抱着膝坐着, 想着心事.

sentences.en: Tony didn't notice because he was too engrossed in his work.
sentences.cn: 托尼因为太专注于自己的工作而毫未察觉。

sentences.en: When the older people became engrossed in their game, Chueh - hsin took the opportunity to depart.
sentences.cn: 觉新跟长辈们谈了几句话,看见大家都在注意地打牌, 便走了出去.

sentences.en: You have been wholly engrossed on the most affectionate principle by my mother.
sentences.cn: 你完全沉浸在母亲的最深厚的慈爱中了.
